Credits
-------

Martijn Faassen - initial developer
Jan-Wijbrand Kolman - suggestions and feedback
Kapil Thangavelu - allowed for multiple workflows in a site, and
parallel workflows, maintainer of [ ore.workflow ]

The hurry.workflow library for Zope 3 was originally developed at
Infrae (http://www.infrae.com).

The ore.workflow was originally developed for the
getpaid ecommerce project ( http://plonegetpaid.com )

This package was forked from hurry.workflow after the attempts to send
the additional functionality with patches and tests to the hurry maintaners.
